channel.title: Error: 508 private server
channel.description: i get an error when i run Run.cmd it says:- Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2194 | java.lang.Runtime Exception Any suggestions ????

item.title: Error: 508 private server

item.description:

item.title: Error: 508 private server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“snatat, post:1, topic:264394”]i get an error when i run Run.cmd it says:-
Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2194 | java.lang.Runtime
Exception Any suggestions ???[/quote]

It can’t find the cache in the directory it is set to look in. This is most likely to be C:/cache508/rs2/.

Read full topic
